option.name: animate_type
option.long: Selects the animation used while tiling

option.name: animation_duration
option.long: Duration (in ms) of the tiling animation

option.name: tile_toggle_type
option.long: Choose the tiling type you want when using toggle.

option.name: tile_join
option.long: Tries to join the windows together when horizontal, vertical or left tiling is enabled so that when you resize a window surrounding windows resize accordingly. This may cause problems if you dont leave them enough space.

option.name: tile_delta
option.long: Distance between windows when using cascade

option.name: tile_left_occupancy
option.long: Occupancy percentage for window placed left. This number is percentage of screen width, which the active window will have it as width when tiled. Applies to Left tiling type.

option.name: exclude_match
option.long: Windows which should be excluded from tiling

option.name: tile_vertically
option.long: Move and resize all visible windows so that they have full height, same width and occupy whole screen.

option.name: tile_horizontally
option.long: Move and resize all visible windows so that they have full width, same height and occupy whole screen.

option.name: tile_tile
option.long: Move and resize all visible windows both vertically and horizontally, so that the occupy whole screen and are in a grid.

option.name: tile_cascade
option.long: Move and resize all visible windows with the delta value set for cascading.

option.name: tile_restore
option.long: Restore windows to their original position they had before tiling.
